Text: Atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ rikoko kʼi chʼe̩daji,
I gbʼomu le̩ gbo̩ n,
Amagboji-wñ ku ma jʼalumeji-wñ
Amakache̩-wñ chʼame̩ne̩fule̩fu,
Jihofa kʼi dʼalumeji-wñ chʼo̩kpakpa,
Omi fʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ko̩da rinyo̩ me̩;
Omi kakini, Uwe̩ arailo mi chuu,
Todule̩ ame̩ ki nede mi, Jihofa aka-i,
Todu e̩gba le̩ omi arʼichi ki de̩ hiolo da
Abo ku ma bi mi ebi
Iko e-le̩ anyo̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩ che le amʼe̩ n,
Omi muda atʼame̩no̩bata ku ma chʼame̩nubie̩ no̩
abo Israe̩l ku ma bo̩ re le̩
Mʼeli da, O o̩ma onobule̩ Zayo̩n;
Jihofa mʼoji ajo̩ kʼi kpa ugbo we̩ ko bʼe̩ te̩ me̩,
O̩jo̩ le̩ ma aka ñw Je̩rusale̩m kakini:
Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, dʼalumeji-we̩,
Nakʼabo ku ma che̩do̩dudu wa tod uje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ da le̩,
Go, iko le̩ nache
Iko le̩ omi ako me̩ wa,
